subject: p13263843
History: Patient with right pleural effusion, placement of pigtail catheter. Assess catheter. Rule out pneumothorax.
Findings: New pigtail is in right lower hemithorax with significant improvement of subpulmonic effusion. Left lower lung pneumonia with small pleural effusion is slightly worse than but improved since. Patient had right upper lobe lobectomy and radiation therapy for cancer, this was better assessed in recent CT scan.
Impression: There is no pneumothorax after pigtail placement. Right subpulmonic pleural effusion has significantly improved.
